summary: This document contains a series of bank statements for Island Grounds Inc. from various dates in 2012 and 2013, detailing account transactions including deposits, checks, and other debits. The statements reflect the financial activities of the account, including payroll transactions and IRS payments. This document contains bank statements for Island Grounds Inc. from First Bank, detailing account balances, transactions, and fees over several months. It includes check images and account activity, indicating regular banking operations and fees associated with the account. This document contains various financial transactions and statements from First Bank Virgin Islands, detailing account activities related to Island Grounds Inc. It includes check images, deposits, and account balances, highlighting significant monetary transactions over specific dates.
